price: 62. Ir iš tiesų, jūs žinote pirmąjį (Adamo (Adomo)) sukūrimą. Argi nebūsite tada sąmoningi?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu al-nashata al-ūlā falawlā tadhakkarūna
